name: Aeroslider
description:
Still a work in progress game for Capstone 2020

Birds that soar .... but without wings.

Aeroslider is a Vehicle exploration game where the player need to traverse a stage collecting upgrades for their vehicle in order to beat other players in various challenges at the end of each round.

Traverse across each section of the stage as you try to collect the eggs that have been scattered all throughout the level! Be the best to see who can collect the most eggs the fastest and be ready to duke it out with your friends!

All feedback is appreciated, thank you.
